name: Queerheart
description:
Queerheart is a small trashgame of queer archive junk by Oma Keeling

Enter the library and experience -

  • A cinema room for groundbreaking queer film
  • The office of Queer Revolution 
  • NEW AND OLD: Contemporary and early 20th century queer poetry
  • Stories in a weird hotel
  • An archive of queer magazine ADVERTISING

PLUS!

  • A musical soundtrack of rare beauty and complexity
  • The heights of digital collage
  • LOVE

GATHER AROUND THIS SMALL ARTEFACT OF WONDER AND GASP...

"HOW QUEER!!"

Afterglow Games. 2019
